before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"aufh1","text":"Prepare Ethanol 70% from absolute Ethanol : Mix 35 mL of absolute Ethanol with 15 mL nuclease-free water in a Falcon 50mL Store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9e1um","text":"It is difficult to get clean RNA from uncultivated protists (phyto and zooplankton), as they have to be isolated by micromanipulation and very sensitive to exogenous contaminations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j5lk","text":"Here we optimized an extraction protocol to get clean DNA-free RNA from protist single-cells for transcriptomic studies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbl11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qi4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Ecology of Marine Plankton (ECOMAP) team - Roscoff

manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"l21b","text":"Rizos I, Romac S, Juery C, Berthelier C, Decelle J, Bernardes J, Corre E, Bittner L, Not F. Single-cell transcriptomics highlights sexual cues among reproductive life stages of uncultivated Acantharia","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nq83","text":"(Radiolaria). DOI:    10.1101/2024.07.02.601653.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":30}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FD562ACB390611EF85BD0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.07.02.601653"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t7a","text":"Isolate individually protist cells (5-500µm in length) using a glass bent micropipette (or a micropipette adapted to the length of the microorganism) under a binocular microscope or an inverted microscope. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4u6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1bok","text":"Wash each cell in three successive baths of 0.22µm-filtered and sterile seawater on a glass slide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au2lr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qc4o","text":"Wash glass bent in H2O Nuclease-free water, and EtOH96%, and then filtered seawter \u003c0,2µm between each bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5s85","text":"Image the isolated cell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eh0kj","text":"Add 30 μL of lysis buffer (Tissue and Cell Lysis Solution from MasterPureTM Complete DNA and RNA Purification Kit, Epicenter) in a 1.5mL sterile microtube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":73,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djb7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ph76","text":"Transfer subsequently single-cell in the 1.5mL microtube, flash-freeze in liquid Nitrogen and store at -80°C for RNA/DNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f0643","text":"Pellet cells by short-spin centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ipni","text":"Dilute 1 µL of Proteinase K in 300 µL de lysis solution Tissue et Cellule for each sample. Vortex 10 sec for resuspending cells (facultative).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crg10","text":"Add 300 µL of mix Proteinase K + lysis solution Tissue et Cellule in each sample. Vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2o7ea","text":"Incubate 15 min at 65°C , 600 rpm. Put samples in ice 3-5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"csjdc","text":"Add 150 µL MPC reagent to 300 µL of lysed sample. Vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ov0v","text":"Spin 10 min at 11 000 g, 4°C. If there is no pellet, add more 25 µL MPC buffer and spin again 10 min at 11000 g, 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29sss","text":"Transfer the supernatant ion a new clean microtube (1,5 mL), discard the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e470h","text":"(To keep the squeletton, keep the tube with the pellet, add 500 µL MilliQ Water and store at -20°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qqca","text":"Add 500 µL of Isopropanol. Mix per inversion. Spin 10min at Vmax (~20 000 g), 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f3ng","text":"Discard the supernatant with precaution, without touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59jri","text":"Add 500 µL of Ethanol 70%. Don’t vortex, mix gently the support. Spin 5min at Vmax (~20 000 g), 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":27,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djb9f","text":"Discard a maximum of supernatant with precaution using both P1000 and P100, without touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7va74","text":"Let dry 5-10 min at room temperature until the pellet becomes transparent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6po30","text":"Elute in 33 µL of TE1x buffer. Vortex and spin shortly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rij0","text":"1- RNA : Take an aliquot of  30 µL and transfer it in a 0.2mL\nsterile microtube. Proceed immediately to the TurboDNase treatment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23fk8","text":"2- DNA : You should have 3µL left for barcoding (PCR 18S1, 18S2, 28S). Store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4b9a0","text":"To 30µL of each RNA extract, add :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k6go","text":"- 3 µL TurboDNase buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r206","text":"- 1µL (2u) of TurboDNase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"495g2","text":"Do a molecular flick.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mf34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqkha","text":"Incubate 25min at 37°C in the thermocycleur.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mq4m","text":"Replace on ice and let incubate on ice for 2min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3f4fn","text":"Add again 1µL (2u) of TurboDNase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f2v7","text":"Do a molecular flick.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dlb0","text":"Incubate 25min at 37°C in the thermocycleur.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34chr","text":"Replace samples on ice. Let incubate on ice for 2min and proceed immediately to RNA concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gh4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"11a3j","text":"Adjust volume of RNA extract to 50µL (Add 15 µL TE1x MP buffer to the 35µL of TurboDNase product).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frah","text":"Add 2v (100µL) of RNA binding buffer. Mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cmbn","text":"Add 1v (150µL) of EtOH 96-100%. Mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p583","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4b73","text":"Transfer into a Zymo-Spin IC Column in a Collection Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qt28","text":"Centrifuge 30sec at 11 000g, at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"76abg","text":"Add 700 µL RNA Wash Buffer. Centrifuge 2min at 11 000g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bfuog","text":"Add 400µL RNA Prep buffer to the column. Centrifuge 30sec at 11 000g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43jf2","text":"Discard the flow-through and replace the column into the Collection Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cbm4d","text":"Transfer the column into a RNA-DNafree microtube (1,5 mL) correctly annotated (sample-template-date).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 5. RNA purification and concentration using RNA Clean and Concentrator-5 kit (ZymoResearch)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5n1nu","text":"Add 11.5µL DNase/RNase free water directly to the column (and 1 µL of RiboGuard if you store at -80°C). Centrifuge 30sec at 11 000g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfr18","text":"Store at -80°C or proceed directly to cDNA synthesis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"dalau","text":"- Always wear a labcoat and gloves during all RNA extraction steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qcso","text":"- Decontaminate all the surface areas, and equipments (rotor, racks, pipettes...) with RNase away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beekj","text":"- Work only with filter tips and sterile microtubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
